metadata.title: CVE-2017-6594 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: The transit path validation code in Heimdal before 7.3 might allowattackers to bypass the capath policy protection mechanism by leveragingfailure to add the previous hop realm to the transit path of issuedtickets.

criterions.comment: heimdal: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'regressions likely').
